<p>I am a Postdoctoral Associate at MIT/EAPS (since April 2023), advised by <a href="https://essg.mit.edu/" target="_blank">Dr. Sai Ravela</a>, in collaboration with <a href="https://emanuel.mit.edu/" target="_blank">Prof. Kerry Emanuel</a> and <a href="https://urbanrisklab.org/" target="_blank">Prof. Miho Mazereeuw</a>, and funded by two MIT Climate Grand Challenge Flagship Projects.
